text: in a hidden clearing in woods in East
Ukraine men prepare for combat until a
few days ago most of them had ordinary
jobs a supermarket worker a miner a
laborer even their commander alexei
mozgovoi is new to all this he used to
run a construction company but is now
ready to lead his men into battle
against what he sees is the illegal
government in Kiev Ukraine is already in
a state of civil war the civil war began
with the first shots in slavyansk and
now it's in full swing the east of
Ukraine is moving steadily towards
Russia and that's a fact
the plan is that when these men leave
here they'll form new armed groups until
each town in East Ukraine has its own
militia their take on this conflict is
the mirror image of many in the West for
them it's the Ukrainian army who are the
aggressors I need their bandits and they
call us separatists and terrorists they
are threatening us with life
imprisonment so far as we're concerned
there are war criminals and faced the
death sentence my family are proud of me
because they know I'm here to offer them
and other families protection and
security they train together and live
together and they're flying the flag of
one of Russia's main political parties
when I first met alexei a month earlier
he just returned from meetings with
officials in Moscow just as the West was
accusing President Putin of stoking
ethnic tensions in the region he's
evasive about who supplied their weapons
mama Barrack Obama Barack Obama gave his
weapons through his politics if he
stayed at home around his own country
and not poked his nose into others they
wouldn't have been any weapon not in
Syria not in Libya and not here
there's a serious point in all that
America and Europe support for the
government in Kiev has inflamed opinion
here many who began as moderates
including Alexei himself will no longer
settle merely for a split from Kiev
they're preparing to fight to be part of
the Russian Federation all Kenyan BBC
News
